00026 void DiagonalDensityHOSlave(void)
00027 {
00028   MPI_Status status;
00029 
00030   DensityMatrixHOPar DMpar;
00031   int A;
00032   SlaterDet Q, Qp, Qpp;
00033   SlaterDetAux X;
00034   complex double* dmme;
00035   int dimdm;
00036 
00037   int task;
00038 
00039   BroadcastTask(&task);
00040   if (task != TASKSTART)
00041     return;
00042 
00043   BroadcastParameters(&DMpar, sizeof(DensityMatrixHOPar));
00044   initHOBasis(DMpar.nmax);
00045 
00046   dimdm = (DMpar.nmax+1)*(DMpar.nmax+2);
00047   dmme = malloc(2*dimdm*sizeof(complex double));
00048 
00049   BroadcastA(&A);
00050 
00051   allocateSlaterDet(&Q, A);
00052   allocateSlaterDet(&Qp, A);
00053   allocateSlaterDet(&Qpp, A);
00054   allocateSlaterDetAux(&X, A);
00055 
00056   while (1) {
00057 
00058     BroadcastTask(&task);
00059     if (task != TASKPROJECTEDDIAGONALDENSITYMATRIXHOOD)
00060       return;
00061 
00062     double projpar[6];
00063     double *angle, *R;
00064 
00065     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Q);
00066     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Qp);
00067 
00068     while (1) {
00069 
00070       MPI_Recv(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00071       if (projpar[0] < 0.0)
00072         break;
00073         
00074       angle = &projpar[0];
00075       R = &projpar[3];
00076       
00077       copySlaterDet(&Qp, &Qpp);
00078 
00079       moveSlaterDet(&Qpp, R);
00080       rotateSlaterDet(&Qpp, angle[0], angle[1], angle[2]);
00081 
00082       calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X); 
00083       calcDiagonalDensityMatrixHOod(&DMpar, &Q, &Qpp, &X, &dmme[0]);
00084 
00085       invertSlaterDet(&Qpp);
00086 
00087       calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X); 
00088       calcDiagonalDensityMatrixHOod(&DMpar, &Q, &Qpp, &X, &dmme[dimdm]);
00089       
00090       MPI_Send(dmme, 2*dimdm*sizeof(complex double), MPI_BYTE, 
00091                0, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00092 
00093     }   
00094 
00095   }
00096 
00097 }
